The pavilion is not too big, and the exhibition is all literature of the east pillar of the Yuan.

As in Seoul, the avenue of Guanghuamen is equivalent to Chang'an Street in Beijing. A wide street, in the middle of the street, there are sculptures of famous Korean historical figures, General Lee, and King Shizong. The size of the statues is very large, giving people a majestic feeling. Especially when it is sunny or sunset, it is more powerful.

The bronze of the king of Sejong is like one of the landmarks of Seoul. At first glance, Guanghuamen Square may be regarded as the gate of other cities, but the king of Sejong is definitely the only one. Tourists who come to Seoul will take pictures here.

The majestic statue is the focal point of Guanghuamen Square, in honour of King Sejong, the fourth and most respected king of the Korean dynasty and creator of the Korean alphabet. The passage behind the statue leads to a museum showing the king's life and achievements. Free admission. Since I saw a drama about the king Sejong, I knew I had to visit his statue and take a photo with it. I didn't know it was in the center of Seoul. It is easy to find and not to be missed when visiting Gyeongboo Palace, Kiyoshikawa and other famous attractions in Seoul. The statue of King Sejong is one of the most popular tourist attractions in the region, so don’t miss the opportunity to take a photo with it. You may have to queue up. If you travel like me, maybe ask someone to take a photo of you.

The most respected King of the Joseon dynasty, King Sejong the Great, who invented the Hangeul alphabets that strongly simplify the words of daily usage, which laid a foundation on the Korean words literature, philosophy and culture.

The bronze statue of the king of Shizong is located in the Guanghuamen Square on the former Shizong Road of Jingfu Palace. Considering that the national hero Shizong is the first king to reign and die in Jingfu Palace, the bronze statue of the king of Shizong was built here to improve the pride of the Korean nation. The excellent nature of the Korean nation spread to all corners of the world.

The greatest contribution of Emperor Sejong was the invention of the Korean character "Xun Min Zheng Yin", which was previously used in Korea. There is a passage under the bronze statue of Emperor Shizong - "Our country's words are different from those of China and Chinese characters. For this reason, ordinary people suffer from inaccurate expression even if they want to say something. I thought it was pathetic, so I created 28 new words. "
It's just a big sculpture. Just a little in front of Jingfu Palace. Just pass by and see it. Nothing special. In winter, it's snowy. It's cold. It's just a small, small and small scenic spot.

The statue of Emperor Sejong, located in the city centre of Seoul, is the equivalent of Tian'anmen Square in Beijing. It is the symbol of the best political status in the eyes of the Korean people. All important gatherings are held here.

The statue of the Great Emperor was erected in front of the square in 2009. There is a small museum nearby. Shizong was a talented politician with great artistic talent. Officials were not promoted according to hereditary principles and abilities. Under the guidance of Confucian ethics, Shizong achieved historical success in defeating Japanese pirates.

The bronze of the king of Shizong is like a highlight of Guanghuamen Square. This king of Shizong is not simple. He invented the Korean language, so he was admired by all Koreans. This is also a must-see place for many other tourists.

In the Sejong Guangxu in Seoul, South Korea, a magnificent bronze statue is erected, that is, the creation of the current Korean text of the King of Sejong, his deeds, all displayed in the Sejong Story Hall on the ground floor of the square, such as you are interested, you can watch and increase your understanding.

The statue of Emperor Shizong was built in 2009. On the Shizong Square in front of Guanghua Gate, behind it is Beiyue Mountain. The statue of Emperor Shizong is lifelike. King Shizong was a very important person in Korean history. He invented Korean characters.

There are two bronze statues in Guanghuamen Square, one is standing Li Shuchen, and the other is sitting King Shizong. During the reign of Shizong, he invented the Zhengyin of the people, which has a profound impact on Korean language and culture. On the left and right sides of the bronze statue are the Korean words invented by the king of Shizong, which is the "Zhengyin of the people".

The statue of King Shizong was built in the center of Guanghuamen Square in Seoul. King Shizong is a famous king in Korean history. It is also a king that Koreans especially admire. The statue of King Shizong is very magnificent, spectacular, and very large. Under the statue of King Shizong, There is also a small museum dedicated to the King of Sejong.

King Sejong is a landmark monarch in ancient Korean history, creating Korean text that continues to this day. The statue of King Sejong is also located in the center of Seoul, a symbol of the Korean national history and culture.
